languages.text: "Чудовищно! И это после всех уговоров его семьи. Верно говорят, у Арбитес нет сердца!"
"How dreadful! And after all the entreaties of his family. It is true what they say — an Arbitrator has no heart!"
languages.original_text: "Чудовищно! И это после всех уговоров его семьи. Верно говорят, у Арбитес нет сердца!"

traits.locale_text: "This is monstrous! And this is after all the entreaties of his family. As they say, the Arbites have no heart!"
"This is monstrous! And after all the entreaties of his family. As they say, the Arbites have no heart!"
"This is monstrous! And after all the entreaties of his family. As they say, the Arbites have no heart!"
"How dreadful! And after all the entreaties of his family. It is true what they say — an Arbitrator has no heart!"
"How dreadful! And after all the entreaties of his family. It is true what they say — an Arbitrator has no heart!"

languages.text: "Wie entsetzlich! Nach all dem Flehen seiner Familie. Stimmt es, was sie sagen ... dass ein Arbitrator kein Herz hat?"
languages.original_text: "How dreadful! And after all the entreaties of his family. It is true what they say — an Arbitrator has no heart!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie entsetzlich! Nach all dem Flehen seiner Familie. Stimmt es, was sie sagen ... dass ein Arbitrator kein Herz hat?"

languages.text: « Quelle horreur ! Sa famille avait pourtant tout fait pour éviter un tel verdict... Décidément, ces arbitrators n'ont pas de cœur ! »
languages.original_text: "How dreadful! And after all the entreaties of his family. It is true what they say — an Arbitrator has no heart!"

traits.locale_text: « Quelle horreur ! Sa famille avait pourtant tout fait pour éviter un tel verdict... Décidément, ces arbitrators n'ont pas de cœur ! »

languages.text: “真是太可怕了！他的家人再三恳求，但一点用都没有！他们说的都是真的，那群法务官根本就没有心！”
languages.original_text: "How dreadful! And after all the entreaties of his family. It is true what they say — an Arbitrator has no heart!"

traits.locale_text: “真是太可怕了！他的家人再三恳求，但一点用都没有！他们说的都是真的，那群法务官根本就没有心！”

languages.text: «¡Qué horror! Y eso después de todos los ruegos de la familia. Es cierto lo que dicen, ¡los Arbitrator no tienen corazón!».
languages.original_text: "How dreadful! And after all the entreaties of his family. It is true what they say — an Arbitrator has no heart!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué horror! Y eso después de todos los ruegos de la familia. Es cierto lo que dicen, ¡los Arbitrator no tienen corazón!».

languages.text: 「なんて酷い話だ！あれほど家族が懇願したというのに。やっぱり言われている通り、アービトレイターには心がないんだ！」
languages.original_text: "How dreadful! And after all the entreaties of his family. It is true what they say — an Arbitrator has no heart!"

traits.locale_text: 「なんて酷い話だ！あれほど家族が懇願したというのに。やっぱり言われている通り、アービトレイターには心がないんだ！」

languages.text: "Ne korkunç! Ailesi ne kadar da yalvarmıştı hâlbuki. Dedikleri doğru, Yargıcılar kalpsiz!"
languages.original_text: "How dreadful! And after all the entreaties of his family. It is true what they say — an Arbitrator has no heart!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne korkunç! Ailesi ne kadar da yalvarmıştı hâlbuki. Dedikleri doğru, Yargıcı'nın kalbi yoktur!"
